description.fr: Victoire : Survivre 10 tours \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Invoque jusqu'à 6 {%FAMILY_VAMPYRE_NAME, plural:other} à côté\_ des {ObjectMechanism:60, plural:other!}. \--- Leur puissance dépend du nombre de {FloorMechanism:309,plural:other!} présentes sur le terrain. \--- SCORE\_: Points des {%FAMILY_VAMPYRE_NAME, plural:other} vaincus + Points de {%PV} perdues du {Weapon:303!} x{value:mult} tant qu'il est en vie.
description.en: Victory: Survive 10 turns. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Summons up to 6 {%FAMILY_VAMPYRE_NAME, plural:other} next to\_ {ObjectMechanism:60, plural:other!}. \--- Their power depends on the number of {FloorMechanism:309,plural:other!} present on the field. \--- SCORE: Points from defeated {%FAMILY_VAMPYRE_NAME, plural:other} + the {Weapon:303!}'s lost {%PV} x {value:mult} while he is alive.
description.es: Victoria: Sobrevivir 10 turnos \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Invoca hasta a 6 {%FAMILY_VAMPYRE_NAME, plural:other} al lado\_ de los {ObjectMechanism:60, plural:other!}. \--- Su potencia depende del número de {FloorMechanism:309,plural:other!} presentes en el terreno. \--- PUNTUACIÓN: Puntos de los {%FAMILY_VAMPYRE_NAME, plural:other} vencidos + Puntos de {%PV} perdidos del {Weapon:303!} x{value:mult} mientras esté con vida.
description.de: Sieg: Überlebe 10\_Runden \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Beschwöre bis zu 6\_{%FAMILY_VAMPYRE_NAME, plural:other} neben\_ {ObjectMechanism:60, plural:other!}. \--- Ihre Schlagkraft hängt von der Anzahl der {FloorMechanism:309,plural:other!} auf dem Spielfeld ab. \--- PUNKTE: Punkte der besiegten {%FAMILY_VAMPYRE_NAME, plural:other} + verlorene {%PV} von {Weapon:303!} x{value:mult}, solange er am Leben ist.
description.pt: Vitória: Sobreviver 10 turnos \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Invoca até 6 {%FAMILY_VAMPYRE_NAME, plural:other} ao lado\_ dos {ObjectMechanism:60, plural:other!}. \--- Sua potência depende do número de {FloorMechanism:309,plural:other!} presentes no campo de batalha. \--- PONTUAÇÃO: Pontos dos {%FAMILY_VAMPYRE_NAME, plural:other} derrotados + pontos de {%PV} perdidos pelo {Weapon:303!} x{value:mult} enquanto ele estiver vivo.
